title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Tua and the Dolphins - should he be insulted that the team tried to replace him with Brady? NBC Sports NFL Analyst Chris Simms shares experiences with the NFL's drug program. Todd explains his tribute song to Olivia Newton John.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
